page1.heading: Welcome
page1.intro: Minibits is an ecash and Lightning wallet with a focus on performance and usability. Ecash is a bearer token issued by custodians known as mints.
page1.bullet1: Minibits follows the Cashu protocol, where mints back ecash with Bitcoin.
page1.bullet2: Ecash is issued or exchanged back to Bitcoin instantly through Lightning payments.
page1.bullet3: Ecash tokens are stored on-device; mints do not keep ledger or wallet balances.
page1.final: No Watson, there is no blockchain.

page2.heading: Why Minibits?
page2.intro: Minibits' aim is to research how Lightning and ecash can be integrated into a seamless and instant experience that can work at scale and still provide good privacy.
page2.bullet1: Minibits provides sharable wallet identifiers using NOSTR addresses. Like account numbers, just better.
page2.bullet2: Try in-person sends while devices are offline - ecash settles when back online (Proof of concept).
page2.bullet3: You can opt-in for storage encryption and biometric authentication.
page2.final: Minibits is free and open-source software; find us on Github for the roadmap and contributions.

page3.heading: Do not forget
page3.intro: Both the Cashu protocol and the Minibits wallet are still experimental, and by using them, you accept known and unknown risks.
page3.bullet1: Mints are, by design, custodial services. Run your own or use them only for research and testing purposes.
page3.bullet2: Ecash is stored on your device, so the loss of the device means the loss of ecash. Remote backup protocol is still under research.
page3.bullet3: Minibits provides its own mint that you can use for testing purposes with small amounts. It is operated on a best-effort basis and without any guarantees.

receiveScreen.title: Receive

newMintsAdded.one: {{count}} mint has been added to your wallet
newMintsAdded.other: {{count}} mints have been added to your wallet

receiveScreen.sharePaymentRequestDescription: Send payment request to one of your contacts, so that the payer can pay you exact amount.
receiveScreen.scanToReceiveDescription: Scan or paste ecash token or LNURL withdraw link to receive into your wallet.
receiveScreen.pasteoReceiveDescription: Paste ecash token to receive it into your wallet.
receiveScreen.showOrShareInvoiceDescription: Present or share lightning invoice for an amount you want to receive.

topup.missingMintAddFirstDesc: There is no mint connected to your wallet eligible for receiving ecash.
topup.nostrDMreceived: nostr:%{npub} sent you Lightning invoice for ${amount} ${currency} from Minibits wallet!
topup.relayMissingSentEvent: Relay could not confirm that the message has been published.

sendScreen.title: Send
sendScreen.sendToContactDescription: Send your ecash to one of your contacts stored in your contact list.
sendScreen.scanToPayDescription: Scan Lightning invoice, LNURL pay code or Lightning address to pay.
sendScreen.pasteToSendDescription: Paste lightning invoice from clipboard to pay it from your wallet.
sendScreen.showOrShareTokenDescription: Present or share ecash token for an amount you want to send.

ownName.donationSuccess: Thank you! Donation for %{receiver} has been successfully paid.
ownName.tooShort: Please use at least 2 characters for your name
ownName.illegalChar: Do not use . or - characters at the beginning or the end of name.
ownName.profileExists: This wallet name is already in use, choose another one.
ownName.payToGetOwnName: Pay the following lightning invoice and get your %{name} wallet name.
ownName.insufficient: Your wallet balance is not enough to pay this invoice amount but you can still pay it from another wallet.
ownName.betaWarning: Please accept this is an early beta software. Your data can still be lost due to a bug or unexpected data loss.

privateContacts.selectSendPaymentRequest: Select contact to send your payment request to.
privateContacts.selectSendToken: Select contact to send your ecash to.
privateContacts.selectSendLnURL: Select contact to send Lightning payment to.
privateContacts.saveNewFormat: Please enter a wallet address in name@domain.xyz format
privateContacts.profileNotFound: Profile name %{name} could not be found. Make sure the name is correct.
privateContacts.explainerSubText: Add other Minibits users as your private contacts. Every user gets sharable @minibits.cash wallet address. You can pay privately to your contacts anytime even if they are offline.
privateContacts.switchName: Switch your wallet name and picture?
privateContacts.switchNameSubText: Get cooler wallet name or profile picture. Select from an array of random names and images or opt for your own @minibits.cash wallet name.
privateContacts.bottomModal: Private contacts are unique identifiers of other Minibits wallets. You can use them to send or request ecash and you can safely share your own with others.

publicContacts.npubPasteError: Copy your NPUB key before pasting

noLightningUseEcash: This contact does not have a Lightning address, send ecash instead.

incoming.noRequests: There are no incoming payment requests to be paid or they have already expired.

outgoing.noRequests: There are no outgoing payment requests to be paid or they have already expired.

profileScreen.changeAvatarSubtext: Select one from randomly generated pictures.
profileScreen.changeWalletaddressSubtext: Change unique wallet address. Select one of randomly generated or choose your own.

mintsScreen.mintUrlHint: Provide the URL of a trusted mint
mintsScreen.invalidUrl: This is not a valid URL
mintsScreen.mintBlocked: The mint has been blocked. The app will not receive ecash from this mint.
mintsScreen.mintUnblocked: The mint has been unblocked. You can now receive ecash from this mint.

backupScreen.localBackupDescription: Local backup stores a copy of all your ecash in the local database. Ecash is never deleted unless you switch off the backup. Please note that this backup is not encrypted.
backupScreen.remoteBackupDescription: Mnemonic phrase encodes your seed and allows you to recover your ecash balance in case of device loss.
backupScreen.recoveryToolDescription: Show ecash backed up in the local database and attempt to recover unspent ones into the wallet in case the wallet storage gets corrupted or a transaction fails due to an unexpected error.
backupScreen.removeSpentCoinsDescription: In case of a SEND or TRANSFER transaction error, spent ecash may remain in your wallet. This blocks further transactions with the mint, making the wallet unusable. This tool removes spent ecash from the wallet.
backupScreen.result: %{proofCount} ecash proofs, %{amount} in total were removed from the wallet.
backupScreen.success: Your minibits tokens were backed up to local database. New tokens will be backed up automatically.
backupScreen.deletedSuccess: Your backup of minibits tokens has been deleted. New tokens will NOT be backed up.
backupScreen.invalidMnemonicError: Corrupted or invalid mnemonic. Please move funds and reinstall this wallet.
backupScreen.mnemonicDesc: This 12 word sequence represents your seed and allows you to recover your ecash balance in case of device loss. Keep them in safe place.

securityScreen.encryptStorageDescription: Encrypt the storage that stores your ecash with the secret key generated on your device. Experimental, not recommended for every day use.
securityScreen.biometryAvailable: Biometric authentication is now required for Minibits to start and unlock the encryption key.
securityScreen.biometryNone: You have not setup biometric authentication or your device does not support it.

privacyScreen.torDaemonDescription: Allow connections with mints through Tor .onion addresses.
privacyScreen.loggerDescription: Log anonymous error information in order to identify and fix wallet bugs during beta testing. Switch off for best privacy.

updateScreen.nativeUpdateAvailableDesc: There is a new version of Minibits Wallet in the Google Play Store.
updateScreen.updateAvailableDesc: There is a new Over-the-Air update of Minibits Wallet ready to download and install.
updateScreen.updateNotAvailableDesc: Good, you are running the latest version of the app.

developerScreen.title: Developer options
developerScreen.transactionsDescription: There are {{count}} recent transactions cached in the app's fast storage. Resetting will reload them from the app's database. Do only during development or testing.
developerScreen.resetDescription: This will wipe out all local data from storage and from the local database. Do only during development or testing.

errorScreen.title: Something went wrong!
errorScreen.friendlySubtitle: Unfortunately, the Minibits app encountered an unexpected error. Please contact us at support@minibits.cash or raise an issue on Github.

lightningPayScreen.onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy Lightning invoice, address or pay code to pay to. Then paste.

scanScreen.onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy ecash token, invoice, LNURL link or lightning address. Then paste.

tokenReceiveScreen.onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy ecash token, then paste.

transferScreen.insufficientFunds: There is not enough balance in %{currency} to pay the invoice amount and expected fees: %{amount} %{currency}
transferScreen.noMintWithBalance: There is no mint with %{unit} balance from which payment can be made.
transferScreen.selectMintFrom: Select mint balance to transfer from
transferScreen.LUD18unsupported: Minibits does not yet support entering of payer identity data (LUD18).

payCommon.insufficientFunds: There are not enough funds to send this amount.

lightningInvoiceSharedWaiting: Lightning invoice has been shared, waiting to be paid by receiver.

qr.fail: Could not display QR code, copy or share the Ecash token instead.

noSpentEcashFound: No spent ecash found in your wallet
walletAddressRecoveryDesc: Use your mnemonic phrase from another device to get your original wallet address on this device. This will not recover balances.
increaseRecoveryIndexesDesc: After incomplete recovery from seed or other rare issue, you may encounter 'duplicate outputs' error when trying to send. This resets your recovery indexes to higher value in order to resolve the issue.
profileMissingNostrAddress: This profile does not have nostr address to send ecash to.
checkAndSyncDesc: Checks that contact name is still linked to the same pubkey and updates picture if it was changed.
deleteContactDesc: Remove this contact from your wallet.
setContactPrivateDesc: Save %{nip05} to your Private contacts so you can pay faster
resetCompletedDetail: Reset completed. %{transCount} recent transactions were loaded from database.
resetAborted: Reset aborted, there are no transactions in local database.
factoryResetUserConfirmDesc: All application data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to perform a factory reset?
factoryResetSuccess: Factory reset completed, please restart immediately.
showOnboardingDesc: Go through onboarding screens again next time you restart Minibits.
loglevelErrorDesc: Log errors and crashes only, without private data.
loglevelInfoDesc: Log anonymous usage, without private data.
loglevelDebugDesc: Log details, set only if testing or on request by support.
userErrorMissingLightningData: Missing Lightning invoice, paycode or address.
payWithLightningDesc: Enter or paste Lightning address, invoice or LNURL pay code you want to pay to.
missingMintsForProofsUserMessage: Please add all mints belonging to your proofs to the wallet and try again.
backupWillOverwriteBalanceWarning: Your wallet has non zero-balance. If you continue, existing ecash will be deleted and replaced by backup.
confirmBackupRecovery: Do you really want to recover ecash from the backup?
removingMintLostBalanceWarning: Your wallet has non-zero balance with this mint. If removed, your ecash will be lost!
confirmMintRemoval: Do you really want to remove %{hostname} - %{shortname} from the wallet?

nostr.tipSubText: Add your NOSTR social network public key (npub) and tip or donate to your favourite people and projects directly from the minibits wallet.
nostr.setPublicKeySubText: Add or change your NOSTR social network public key (npub).
nostr.setRelaySubText: Add or change your own relay if your profile and follows are not hosted on the default relays.
nostr.removePubSubText: Remove your npub key and stop loading public contacts.
nostr.pasteError: Copy your NOSTR address first, then paste.
nostr.invalidAddressFormat: Invalid NOSTR address, please check that it follows name@domain.com format
nostr.minibitsNameKeyReuseError: %{domain} names and keys can't be used with multiple wallets.
nostr.profileRetrieveError: Could not retrieve profile from relays
nostr.profileRelayMismatchedIdentifierError: Profile from the relay does not match the given nip05 identifier
nostr.enterAddressDesc: Minibits uses Nostr address (nip05) as a sharable contact to send and receive ecash.

lastStandDialog.title: Consider before change
lastStandDialog.desc: Using your own Nostr address will disable Lightning address features unique to minibits.cash address.
lastStandDialog.readyDesc: Wallet needs to restart to apply this change.

useOwnProfile.title: Use own Nostr profile
useOwnProfile.desc: Import your own Nostr address and keys. Your wallet will stop communicating with minibits.cash Nostr and LNURL address servers, disabling Lightning address features for receiving zaps and payments. Only for hardcore ecash-ers!

nsecPasteError: Copy your nsec key first, then paste.
nsecPrivatePublicKeyMismatchError: Provided private key does not match your new profile public key.
nsecEnterPrivateKeyDesc: Minibits needs your private key in nsec format in order to decrypt messages containing incoming payments. Your key will be stored in your device secure key vault.
pictureRetrieveFail: Could not retrieve pictures from the server, try again later.
profilePublicKeyMismatchError: Profile from relays public key differs from yor wallet pubkey. Reset this profile in Privacy settings and import again with new keys.

profileOnboarding.title: Create wallet address
profileOnboarding.desc: Your minibits.cash wallet address allows you to receive encrypted ecash over Nostr. Simultaneously, it serves as your Lightning address, enabling you to receive payments from any Lightning wallet or zaps on the Nostr social network.
profileOnboarding.ownAddrDesc: You are using your own Nostr address to send and receive ecash. Please note that this setup does not allow you to receive Nostr zaps or Lightning payments to this address.
profileOnboarding.minibitsDesc: Share your wallet address to receive encrypted ecash over Nostr. This also serves as your Lightning address, enabling you to receive payments from any Lightning wallet or zaps on the Nostr social network.

syncOwnProfileDesc: Synchronize your profile name and picture with up to date information from Nostr relays.
resetOwnProfileDesc: Stop using your own NOSTR address and re-create Minibits wallet profile.
decodedMissingCurrencyUnit: Currency unit is missing in the received token. Wallet will assume token amount is in bitcoin $%{unit}. Do not continue if you are not sure this is correct.
relayurlPasteError: Copy your relay URL key before pasting
copyMnemonicBackupWorkaround: To apply backup to your existing funds, send your entire balance to yourself. Otherwise, only funds from this point onward can be restored.
derivingSeedStatus: Deriving seed, this takes a while...
recoveryInvalidMnemonicError: Invalid mnemonic phrase. Provide 12 word sequence separated by blank spaces.

recovery.resultSpent: Good news is that already spent Ecash has been found. Continue with next recovery interval.
recovery.resultExpired: Nothing has been found in this recovery interval.
recovery.seedFromCurrentDeviceError: Can not use seed from this device.
recovery.ownKeysImportAgain: You used wallet address %{addr} with your own keys, import it again.
recovery.noWalletForSeedError: Could not find wallet address linked to your seed on the server.
recovery.missingMnemonicSeedProfileError: Missing mnemonic or seed or profile to recover.
recovery.mnemonicCollisionDesc: Your wallet already has another mnemonic in its secure storage. Recovery process works only with freshly installed wallet to avoid loss of your funds.
recovery.startIndexDesc: Use to increase starting index of recovery interval e.g. in case of repeated recovery. You need to know at what index you completed your previous recovery or you'll miss ecash to recover.
recovery.selectKeyset: Select keyset to be used for recovery

profileToRecoverDesc: This is the wallet address linked to your seed. If you press Complete, your wallet profile will reset to above seed and address.
recoveryFromMintsDesc: Identify mints to recover your ecash from and add them to the list.
recoveryInsertMnemonicDesc: Paste or rewrite 12 word phrase to recover your ecash balance and wallet address on this device. Separate words by blank spaces.
recoveryInsertMnemonicDescAddrOnly: Paste or rewrite 12 word phrase to recover your wallet address on this device. Separate words by blank spaces.
scanReceiveExtractFail: Could not extract ecash token nor LNURL withdraw link to receive.
missingMintUnitRouteParamsError: Missing mint unit in route params
pasteEcashTokenDesc: Paste ecash token you want to receive.
